revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Bois Baies |image = [[File:Berry Forest.png|thumb]] |caption = Une carte du Bois Baies. |tokens = 1 750 |location = Île 3 de l'Archipel Sevii. }} Le '''Bois Baies''' est un [[Dungeons|donjon]] de [[Kanto]]. Il a 25 cases arrangées en 5x5, comprenant 5 coffres, 13 rencontres hors boss et 1 case de Combat de Boss. Les rencontres sauvages ont 18 120 PV. == Tables des rencontres == ===Rencontres Sauvages=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon sauvages !! colspan=2|Dresseurs |- ! Rencontre !! Dresseur !! Équipe Pokémon |- | [[File:Pidgey.png|40px]] Roucool || colspan=2, rowspan=16|
N/A |- | [[File:Pidgeotto.png|40px]] Roucoups |- | [[File:Oddish.png|40px]] Mystherbe |- | [[File:Gloom.png|40px]] Ortide |- | [[File:Venonat.png|40px]] Mimitoss |- | [[File:Psyduck.png|40px]] Psykokwak |- | [[File:Golduck.png|40px]] Akwakwak |- | [[File:Poliwag.png|40px]] Ptitard |- | [[File:Bellsprout.png|40px]] Chétiflor |- | [[File:Weepinbell.png|40px]] Boustiflor |- | [[File:Slowpoke.png|40px]] Ramoloss |- | [[File:Slowbro.png|40px]] Flagadoss |- | [[File:Drowzee.png|40px]] Soporifik |- | [[File:Exeggcute.png|40px]] Noeunoeuf |- | [[File:Goldeen.png|40px]] Poissirène |- | [[File:Magikarp.png|40px]] Magicarpe |} ===Combats de Boss=== {| class="wikitable" |- !
